data.body:
Just for the record, I confirmed that the performance regression was fixed for IE 11 and Microsoft Edge.

Internet Explorer 11
```
arrayMinOld: 336.299ms
arrayMaxOld: 359.206ms
arrayMin: 450.848ms
arrayMax: 476.854ms
arrayMinPR: 356.241ms
arrayMaxPR: 358.202ms
```

Microsoft Edge 38.14393.0.0
```
arrayMinOld: 489.585ms
arrayMaxOld: 463.245ms
arrayMin: 594.235ms
arrayMax: 595.625ms
arrayMinPR: 485.445ms
arrayMaxPR: 461.875ms
```
